scripts.setup:env: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env.local')) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.example', '.env.local'); console.log('‚úÖ Created .env.local from .env.example'); } else { console.log('‚úÖ .env.local already exists'); }"
scripts.restart: npm run down && npm run up
scripts.clean: docker-compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.clean-all: docker-compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -a -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.dev: npm run up && npm run logs
scripts.test:health: node -e "setTimeout(() => { require('http').get('http://localhost:8080', (res) => { console.log('‚úÖ Application is running at http://localhost:8080'); console.log('üéâ Setup complete! Visit http://localhost:8080 in your browser'); process.exit(0); }).on('error', (e) => { console.log('‚ùå Application health check failed:', e.message); process.exit(1); }); }, 3000);"
scripts.check:docker: node -e "require('child_process').exec('docker info', (err) => { if (err) { console.log('‚ùå Docker is not running. Please start Docker Desktop'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('‚úÖ Docker is running'); } });"
